item.name: Sihedron's Medallion (GM)
item.special_properties: While worn, a Sihedron medallion grants its wearer a +1 resistance bonus on all saving throws. Once per day, as a free action, it may be commanded to bestow the effects of false life on the wearer. Placed on the neck of a dead body, a Sihedron medallion preserves the body indefinitely via a gentle repose effect., Resistance bonus to all saving throws of +1

item.name: Ring of Protection +1
item.source: Paizo Publishing LLC - Ultimate Equipment, p.172
item.quality: Aura: faint abjuration, Caster Level: 5th, Construction Cost: 1,000 gp, Construction Requirements: Forge Ring, shield of faith, caster must be of a level at least three times the bonus of the ring, Slot: ring

item.name: Belt ( Skill Bonus (Competence) (Use Magic Device +10))
item.special_properties: Competence bonus to selected skill of Use Magic Device|+10

item.name: Wand of Acid Arrow
item.special_properties: An arrow of acid springs from your hand and speeds to its target dealing 2d4 points of acid damage.
item.quality: Aura: faint conjuration (creation) [acid], Caster Level: 3rd, Construction Cost: 2,250 gp, Construction Requirements: Craft Wand, acid arrow, Slot: none

item.name: Wand of Cure Moderate Wounds (CL 5)
item.special_properties: When laying your hand upon a living creature, you channel positive energy that cures 2d8+5 points of damage., (Wand of Cure Moderate Wounds)
item.source: Personalizzato - Paizo Inc. - Core Rulebook, p.496
item.quality: Aura: faint conjuration (healing), Caster Level: 3rd, Construction Cost: 2,250 gp, Construction Requirements: Craft Wand, cure moderate wounds, Slot: none

item.name: Wand of Enervation
item.special_properties: Subject gains 1d4 negative levels.
item.quality: Aura: moderate necromancy, Caster Level: 7th, Construction Cost: 10,500 gp, Construction Requirements: Craft Wand, enervation, Slot: none

item.name: Wand of Haste
item.special_properties: One creature/level moves faster, receives +1 on attack rolls, AC, and Reflex saves.
item.quality: Aura: faint transmutation, Caster Level: 5th, Construction Cost: 5,625 gp, Construction Requirements: Craft Wand, haste, Slot: none

item.name: Wand of Magic Missile
item.special_properties: 1 to 5 missiles that do 1d4+1 damage each.
item.quality: Aura: faint evocation [force], Caster Level: 1st, Construction Cost: 375 gp, Construction Requirements: Craft Wand, magic missile, Slot: none

item.name: Wand of Ray of Enfeeblement
item.special_properties: A coruscating ray springs from your hand, the subject takes a penalty to Strength equal to 1d6+1/two level, max +5.
item.quality: Aura: faint necromancy, Caster Level: 1st, Construction Cost: 375 gp, Construction Requirements: Craft Wand, ray of enfeeblement, Slot: none

item.name: Wand of Scorching Ray
item.special_properties: You blast your enemies with up to 1-3 searing beams of fire dealing 4d6 points of fire damage.
item.quality: Aura: faint evocation [fire], Caster Level: 3rd, Construction Cost: 2,250 gp, Construction Requirements: Craft Wand, scorching ray, Slot: none

item.name: Wand of Vampiric Touch
item.special_properties: Touch deals 1d6 damage per two levels; caster gains damage as temporary hp.
item.quality: Aura: faint necromancy, Caster Level: 5th, Construction Cost: 5,625 gp, Construction Requirements: Craft Wand, vampiric touch, Slot: none

feat.name: Dodge
feat.description: Your training and reflexes allow you to react swiftly to avoid an opponent's attack.
feat.benefit: You gain a +1 dodge bonus to your AC. A condition that makes you lose your Dex bonus to AC also makes you lose the benefits of this feat.

feat.name: Weapon Finesse
feat.description: You are trained in using your agility in melee combat, as opposed to brute strength.
feat.benefit: With a light weapon, rapier, whip, or spiked chain made for a creature of your size category, you may use your Dexterity modifier instead of your Strength modifier on attack rolls. If you carry a shield, its armor check penalty applies to your attack rolls.

special_quality.name: Alertness (Ex)
special_quality.description: While a familiar is within arm's reach, the master gains the Alertness feat.

special_quality.name: Aligned (Evil, Lawful)
special_quality.description: Your natural weapons, as well as any weapons you wield, are treated as Evil and Lawful for the purpose of resolving damage reduction.

special_quality.name: Change Shape (Su)
special_quality.description: An Imp has the ability to assume the appearance of a Boar, Giant Spider, Rat, or Raven, but retains most of its own physical qualities. An Imp cannot change shape to a form more than one size category smaller or larger than its original form. This ability functions as a polymorph spell, but it does not adjust its ability scores (although it gains any other abilities of the creature it mimics).
special_quality.aspect: Ability Benefit: (Boar, Giant Spider, Rat, or Raven, Beast Shape I)

special_quality.name: Darkvision (Ex)
special_quality.description: Range 60 ft.; Darkvision is the extraordinary ability to see with no light source at all, out to a range specified for the creature. Darkvision is black and white only (colors cannot be discerned). It does not allow characters to see anything that they could not see otherwise-invisible objects are still invisible, and illusions are still visible as what they seem to be. Likewise, darkvision subjects a creature to gaze attacks normally. The presence of light does not spoil darkvision.

special_quality.name: Detect Good (Sp)
special_quality.description: You can Detect Good, as per the spell, as a constant ability. Constant spell-like abilities function at all times but can be dispelled. Constant spell-like abilities can be reactivated a as a swift action.

special_quality.name: Detect Magic (Sp)
special_quality.description: You detect magical auras, as per the spell Detect Magic, as a constant ability. Constant spell-like abilities function at all times but can be dispelled. Constant spell-like abilities can be reactivated a as a swift action.

special_quality.name: Empathic Link (Su)
special_quality.description: The master has an empathic link with his familiar to a 1 mile distance. The master can communicate emphatically with the familiar, but cannot see through its eyes. Because of the link's limited nature, only general emotions can be shared. The master has the same connection to an item or place that his familiar does.

special_quality.name: Fast Healing (Ex)
special_quality.description: You regain hit points at 2 hit points per round. You regain hit points at 2 per round. Fast healing does not restore hit points lost from starvation, thirst, or suffocation, nor does it allow a creature to regrow lost body parts. Unless otherwise stated, it does not allow lost body parts to be reattached. Fast healing continues to function (even at negative hit points) until a creature dies, at which point the effects of fast healing end immediately.

special_quality.name: Immunity to Fire (Ex)
special_quality.description: You never take fire damage.

special_quality.name: Immunity to Poison (Ex)
special_quality.description: You never take poison damage.

special_quality.name: Improved Evasion (Ex)
special_quality.description: When subjected to an attack that normally allows a Reflex saving throw for half damage, a familiar takes no damage if it makes a successful saving throw and half damage even if the saving throw fails.

special_quality.name: Intelligence Score
special_quality.description: The familiar's Intelligence score.

special_quality.name: Natural Armor Bonus
special_quality.description: The number noted here is in addition to the familiar's existing natural armor bonus.

special_quality.name: Resistance to Acid (Ex)
special_quality.description: You may ignore 10 points of Acid damage each time you take acid damage.
special_quality.aspect: Ability Benefit: 10, Resistance: Acid, ResistanceOutput: Acid 10

special_quality.name: Resistance to Cold (Ex)
special_quality.description: You may ignore 10 points of Cold damage each time you take cold damage.
special_quality.aspect: Ability Benefit: 10, Resistance: Cold, ResistanceOutput: Cold 10

special_quality.name: Scry on Familiar (Sp)
special_quality.description: If the master is 13th level or higher, he may scry on his familiar (as if casting the scrying spell) once per day.

special_quality.name: See in Darkness (Su)
special_quality.description: Devils can see perfectly in darkness of any kind, even that created by a deeper darkness spell.

special_quality.name: Share Spells (Ex)
special_quality.description: The wizard may cast a spell with a target of "You" on his familiar (as a touch spell) instead of on himself. A wizard may cast spells on his familiar even if the spells do not normally affect creatures of the familiar's type (magical beast).

special_quality.name: Speak with Master (Ex)
special_quality.description: If the master is 5th level or higher, a familiar and the master can communicate verbally as if they were using a common language. Other creatures do not understand the communication without magical help.

special_quality.name: Spell Resistance (Ex)
special_quality.description: If the master is 11th level or higher, a familiar gains spell resistance equal to the master's level + 5. To affect the familiar with a spell, another spellcaster must get a result on a caster level check (1d20 + caster level) that equals or exceeds the familiar's spell resistance.

special_quality.name: Telepathy (Su)
special_quality.description: You can mentally communicate with any other creature within 100 feet that has a language. It is possible to address multiple creatures at once telepathically, although maintaining a telepathic conversation with more than one creature at a time is just as difficult as simultaneously speaking and listening to multiple people at the same time.

special_attack.name: Deliver Touch Spells (Su)
special_attack.description: If the master is 3rd level or higher, a familiar can deliver touch spells for him. If the master and the familiar are in contact at the time the master casts a touch spell, he can designate his familiar as the "toucher." The familiar can then deliver the touch spell just as the master would. As usual, if the master casts another spell before the touch is delivered, the touch spell dissipates.

special_attack.name: Poison (Ex)
special_attack.description: Sting--injury; save Fort DC 13; frequency 1/round for 6 rounds; effect 1d2 Dex; cure 1 save.

spell.name: Augury
spell.effect: An augury can tell you whether a particular action will bring good or bad results for you in the immediate future.
spell.description: An augury can tell you whether a particular action will bring good or bad results for you in the immediate future.

spell.name: Commune (six questions)
spell.effect: You contact your deity--or agents thereof--and ask questions that can be answered by a simple yes or no.
spell.description: You contact your deity--or agents thereof--and ask questions that can be answered by a simple yes or no.

spell.name: Detect Good
spell.effect: You can sense the presence of good.
spell.description: You can sense the presence of good.

spell.name: Invisibility (self only)
spell.effect: The creature or object touched becomes invisible.
spell.target: You or a creature or object weighing no more than 600 lbs.
spell.saveinfo: Will negates (harmless) or Will negates (harmless, object)
spell.description: The creature or object touched becomes invisible.

spell.name: Suggestion
spell.effect: You influence the actions of the target creature by suggesting a course of activity.
spell.description: You influence the actions of the target creature by suggesting a course of activity.
